title: Tom Purdom
text: Thomas Edward Purdom (born 1936) is an American writer best known for science fiction and nonfiction. His story "Fossil Games" was a nominee for the <a href="Hugo%20Award%20for%20Best%20Novelette">Hugo Award for Best Novelette</a> in 2000. He has also done music criticism since 1988. His works have been translated into German, Chinese, Burmese, Russian, and Czech. He lives in <a href="Philadelphia">Philadelphia</a>.
